summary: This mod adds 2 new female Khajiit\'s and 1 new female Argonian to the game that you can marry or use as a follower.
descriptionHtml:
[size=+3][color=red]WIP![/color][/size]

This mod contains new beast followers.


[size=+2][color=red]How to install[/color][/size]
You can use the NMM or put the esp file in the Skyrim data folder C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

Remember that the npc\'s uses normal [color=red]HUMAN[/color] voices because Bethesda didn\'t add khajiit and argonian voices that said certain lines.

[size=+2][color=red]Where can I find them?[/color][/size]
Aela is located in Whiterun at Jorrvaskr
Akisha is located in Solitude at the Winking Skeever
Zalora is located in Markarth at the SilverBloodInn

[size=+2][color=red]The Followers[/color][/size]
Aela is best used as an assassin. She comes default (from the mod) with 80 sneak, 93 archery and 69 in light armor, Theif guild armor, deadric dagger, 150 ebony arrows and a ebony bow. If you marry her she will cook meals to you, open a store and follow you.

Akisha is best used as a warrior/tank. She comes default with 89 in one-handed, 89 heavy armor, block 69, ebony armor and 2 ebony swords.

Zalora is best used as a bad ass killer. She comes default with 89 in two-handed, 89 heavy armor, archery 69, ebony armor, ebony warhammer, ebony bow and 150 ebony arrows.

All of them are at lvl 35.



I will be adding more beast followers and maybe some humans/elves to the mod in the future.


Remember to endorse the mod if you like it!
author: Vipez
